main event: A civilian reported seeing a large green object with a tail in the sky near Rockingham, North Carolina on February 12, 1959.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes., The object was described as having a 200 ft tail and being dark-green in color., The report suggested the object could be a balloon, satellite, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena., An unusual bright light illuminated the town of Rockingham during the sighting., The document is part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO reports.
sighted object: a large green object with a tail
witness description: Civilian, duty sheriff assigned to the police department of Rockingham
